author: jih2nn
content:
Could you try this one? You should be able to search for ILC root logs with "ILC root". It emits it during when IL committee produces IL and when a validator receives and validates an IL. e.g.,

When producing IL: `[cl-1-prysm-geth] time="2025-04-01 07:44:19" level=info msg="Calculating ILC root committee_size 16 committee [202 129 394 280 149 14 203 447 268 66 148 495 509 498 476 291] slot56" prefix="rpc/validator"`

When validating IL: `[cl-1-prysm-geth] time="2025-04-01 07:42:23" level=info msg="Validating ILC root committee_size 16 committee [309 23 375 361 154 99 347 151 341 86 65 59 125 61 265 164] slot36" prefix=sync`

```
    cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: jihoonsg/prysm-beacon-chain-focil:ilc-root
    vc_type: prysm
    vc_image: jihoonsg/prysm-validator-focil:ilc-root
```
